mapper.sql: data_id, cgid, nd, cgmc, sqjddw, sqdjh, startTime, endTime, cglx, zy, jdh, issczs, sbzt, jdjg, create_date, create_user_id, update_date, update_user_id, status, remarks, hth, xmmc, rwly, define1, define2, define3, define4, define5, define6
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from out_appraisal
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select:
select count(*) from ( select cgid from out_appraisal where status = '1'
and nd = #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and define2 is not null
group by cgid ) as tableA

select count(*) as sl, sum(case when cglx = 'A.工业化' then 1 else 0 end) as gyhsl, sum(case when cglx = 'B.工业试验' then 1 else 0 end) as gysysl, SUBSTR(define1 FROM 4) define1 from out_appraisal where define1 is not NULL and nd='2017' group by define1
select count(*) as sl, cglx from out_appraisal where cglx is not NULL and nd='2018' group by cglx
select count(*) as sl, zy from out_appraisal where zy is not NULL and nd='2018' group by zy
select count(*) as sl, SUBSTR(define3 FROM 2) define3 from out_appraisal where define3 is not NULL and nd='2018' group by define3
